languages.text: Мертвец, свершивший свою месть ткачам, застыл с отравленной иглой в шее, на губах его застыла злобная улыбка.
The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.
languages.original_text: Мертвец, свершивший свою месть ткачам, застыл с отравленной иглой в шее, на губах его застыла злобная улыбка.

traits.locale_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

languages.text: Celui qui se prétendait un homme mort semble s'être vengé des tisseurs. Il gît désormais au sol, une aiguille empoisonnée plantée dans le cou et un rictus sur les lèvres.
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

traits.locale_text: Celui qui se prétendait un homme mort semble s'être vengé des tisseurs. Il gît désormais au sol, une aiguille empoisonnée plantée dans le cou et un rictus sur les lèvres.

languages.text: Quien afirmaba estar ya muerto, habiéndose vengado de los tejedores, yace inerte con una aguja envenenada en el cuello y una mueca burlona en los labios.
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

traits.locale_text: Quien afirmaba estar ya muerto, habiéndose vengado de los tejedores, yace inerte con una aguja envenenada en el cuello y una mueca burlona en los labios.

languages.text: 死人と名乗っ者のは紡ぎ手に復讐を果たして、首に毒針が刺さったまま、唇に冷たい笑みを浮かべて動かずに横たわっている。
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

traits.locale_text: 死人と名乗っ者のは紡ぎ手に復讐を果たして、首に毒針が刺さったまま、唇に冷たい笑みを浮かべて動かずに横たわっている。

languages.text: 那个自称“已死之人”的人向织网者进行了复仇。此刻，他一动不动地躺在地上，脖子上刺着一根毒针，嘴角依然挂着冷笑。
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

traits.locale_text: 那个自称“已死之人”的人向织网者进行了复仇。此刻，他一动不动地躺在地上，脖子上刺着一根毒针，嘴角依然挂着冷笑。

languages.text: Der Mann, der sich als toten Mann bezzeichnete, liegt nach seiner Rache an den Spinnern bewegungslos am Boden … mit einer Giftnadel im Hals und einem Grinsen auf den Lippen.
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.

traits.locale_text: Der Mann, der sich als toten Mann bezzeichnete, liegt nach seiner Rache an den Spinnern bewegungslos am Boden … mit einer Giftnadel im Hals und einem Grinsen auf den Lippen.

languages.text: Dokurlardan intikamını alan, kendi deyimiyle ölü adam; şimdi boynunda zehirli bir iğne ve yüzünde aşağılayıcı bir tebessümle yerde yatıyor.
languages.original_text: The one who called himself a dead man, having exacted his revenge on the spinners, lies motionless with a poison needle in his neck and a sneer on his lips.
